ISSUE.TITLE: Don't use NopResourceDisplayName beside each property in the admin area models
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.3 Generate resource names automatically based on the property name. Use such prefixes as "Admin.Catalog.Products.Fields." for models and then add a generated property name to this prefix to get the local resource name.
